<4> $the number of levels to read in, this has to be correct and up to date

#Lots'a Average#    $the levels name, displayed in the menu
{ $start of reading
W00101010R
0211020102 $0= empty space, the char could be anything, just so long as its not a key
1102101210 $1= destroyable wall
1201020102 $2= indestructable wall
1002101200 $W= white spawn
1211021012 $Z= black spawn
1002101211 $R= red spawn
0211121102 $B= blue spawn
0010110200
B20200011Z
}

1212020110
0111111210
2002001002
}
